cluster_information.name: Channel
cluster_information.description: Provides an interface for controlling the current Channel on a device or endpoint.

attributes.name: ChannelList
attributes.description: This optional list provides the channels supported.

attributes.name: Lineup
attributes.description: This optional field identifies the channel lineup using external data sources.

attributes.name: CurrentChannel
attributes.description: This optional field contains the current channel. When supported but a channel is not currently tuned to (if a content application is in foreground), the value of the field SHALL be null.
